title: 820-00281 boot issues
message:
Board was messed with before it came to us, Mac had the typical flexgate issue, we fixed that and realized that the other place had shorted the LCD connector and it gave no image any longer after that, after replacing U9850 I got image again, but now the problem I am having is that the OS wont load all the way or worse if I boot holding ALT bot the boot loader the Mac freezes right away, sometimes even without holding ALT the Mac just shows a blank screen.

Already tried clean BIOS found here on forum, but no luck.

I cannot even try to boot from external system since the Mac freezes before even selecting the alternate disk.

title: 820-00281 boot issues
message: Disconnect J9600 and try again to boot from USB...

title: 820-00281 boot issues
message: Same exact behavior, with J9600 removed it also freezes as soon as the screen shows the boot options.

title: 820-00281 boot issues
message: Disconnect J8500 and test with external monitor.

title: 820-00281 boot issues
message: Exact same behavior, also tested with everything disconnected just the USB-C port and same thing also.

title: 820-00281 boot issues
message:
Can you boot Windows, or Linux?
Also try booting macOS in safe mode.

title: 820-00281 boot issues
message: I don't have Windows or Linux, but when booting in safe mode there is a variation, the folder icon flashes when booting in safe mode, I tried removing J9600 and botting in safe mode, same thing happens, flashing folder icon.

title: 820-00281 boot issues
message: In safe mode, remove J9600; it should boot from USB...

title: 820-00281 boot issues
message:
[QUOTE="No-Clean, post: 87510, member: 2508"]
I tried removing J9600 and botting in safe mode, same thing happens, flashing folder icon.
[/QUOTE]

title: 820-00281 boot issues
message: This was done also for external drive, Mac starts to boot but it reboots when the bar barely starts to load.

title: 820-00281 boot issues
message: Did you have USB macOS connected, when started in safe mode (without J9600)?

title: 820-00281 boot issues
message: This was done also for external drive, Mac starts to boot but it reboots when the bar barely starts to load.

title: 820-00281 boot issues
message: Yes, external USB drive with macOS connected and J9600 disconnected Mac starts to boot but it reboots when the bar barely starts to load

title: 820-00281 boot issues
message:
I still recommend to test with Linux, or Windows.
GPU driver is not loaded in such case; will help to diagnose such issue.

title: 820-00281 boot issues
message: Tested with Linux and J9600 removed, some text starts to scroll on screen but shortly after it reboots and starts over again, Linux OS never loads, I also tested that Linux install on a different Mac and it works.

title: 820-00281 boot issues
message:
Reconnect J9600 and start in Target Disk mode; save any data, if needed.
Then start Internet Recovery and check if is possible to reinstall macOS.

title: 820-00281 boot issues
message: When starting in target disk mode as soon as the icon comes on screen the Mac freezes, same thing when trying to install the OS over internet, I am done with this Mac, thanks for help.
